system.availability:
+10 to all Logic or Scholastic Lore(Tactica Imperialis) Tests made in the heat of battle.
Medals can't be acquired, only earned, benefit applied to the whole squad. Looks Like a Large Cross Pattee with a centre flanked by Laurel Leaves.
system.cost: Distinguished Service Medal: Awarded for a victory achieved because of exceptional quick thinking, strong strategy, and tactical acumen.
